errors.error_description: Installing pip packages before installing system dependencies, which could cause compilation issues
correction_candidates: Install system dependencies first: sudo apt-get install python3-dev libffi-dev, then pip install monty numpy scipy

Install in a virtual environment: python -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install monty numpy scipy
Install using package manager: sudo apt-get install python3-monty python3-numpy python3-scipy
